Nālaka Sutta：Preached，seven days after the first sermon，to Nālaka，nephew of Asita．

The sutta itself is a discourse on the state of a recluse （Moneyyapatipadā），but there are twenty introductory verses （called Vatthugāthā） giving the story of Asita and Nālaka （SN．vs．679 723； SNA．ii．501）．

The sutta is also called Nālaka paopadā．（J．i．55）．
